// <auto-generated/>
using System;
using System.Buffers;
using System.Buffers.Binary;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Runtime.CompilerServices;
using System.Text;
using FourSer.Contracts;
using System.IO;
using FourSer.Gen.Helpers;
using SpanReader = FourSer.Gen.Helpers.RoSpanReaderHelpers;
using StreamReader = FourSer.Gen.Helpers.StreamReaderHelpers;
using SpanWriter = FourSer.Gen.Helpers.SpanWriterHelpers;
using StreamWriter = FourSer.Gen.Helpers.StreamWriterHelpers;

namespace FourSer.Tests.GeneratorTestCases.MemoryOwner;

public partial class Child : ISerializable<Child>, IDisposable
{
    public static int GetPacketSize(Child obj)
    {
        if (obj is null) return 0;
        var size = 0;
        size += sizeof(int); // Count size for Numbers
        size += (obj.Numbers?.Memory.Length ?? 0) * sizeof(int);
        return size;
    }

    private Child(System.Buffers.IMemoryOwner<int> numbers)
    {
        this.Numbers = numbers;
    }

    public Child()
    {
        this.Numbers = default;
    }

    public static Child Deserialize(ref System.ReadOnlySpan<byte> buffer)
    {
        var numbersCount = SpanReader.ReadInt32(ref buffer);
        var numbers = MemoryPool<int>.Shared.Rent(numbersCount).SliceToSize(numbersCount);
        var numbersSpan = numbers.Memory.Span;
        var numbersBytes = System.Runtime.InteropServices.MemoryMarshal.AsBytes(numbersSpan);
        SpanReader.ReadBytes(ref buffer, numbersBytes);
        var obj = new Child(numbers);
        return obj;
    }

    public static Child Deserialize(System.ReadOnlySpan<byte> buffer)
    {
        return Deserialize(ref buffer);
    }

    public static Child Deserialize(System.IO.Stream stream)
    {
        var numbersCount = StreamReader.ReadInt32(stream);
        var numbers = MemoryPool<int>.Shared.Rent(numbersCount).SliceToSize(numbersCount);
        var numbersSpan = numbers.Memory.Span;
        var numbersBytes = System.Runtime.InteropServices.MemoryMarshal.AsBytes(numbersSpan);
        stream.ReadExactly(numbersBytes);
        var obj = new Child(numbers);
        return obj;
    }

    public static void Serialize(Child obj, ref System.Span<byte> data)
    {
        if (obj is null) return;
        if (obj.Numbers is null)
        {
            SpanWriter.WriteInt32(ref data, (int)(0));
        }
        else
        {
            SpanWriter.WriteInt32(ref data, (int)(obj.Numbers.Memory.Length));
            var numbersSpan = obj.Numbers.Memory.Span;
            SpanWriter.WriteBytes(ref data, System.Runtime.InteropServices.MemoryMarshal.AsBytes(numbersSpan));
        }
    }

    public static void Serialize(Child obj, System.Span<byte> data)
    {
        Serialize(obj, ref data);
    }

    public static void Serialize(Child obj, System.IO.Stream stream)
    {
        if (obj is null) return;
        if (obj.Numbers is null)
        {
            StreamWriter.WriteInt32(stream, (int)(0));
        }
        else
        {
            StreamWriter.WriteInt32(stream, (int)(obj.Numbers.Memory.Length));
            var numbersSpan = obj.Numbers.Memory.Span;
            StreamWriter.WriteBytes(stream, System.Runtime.InteropServices.MemoryMarshal.AsBytes(numbersSpan));
        }
    }

    public void Dispose()
    {
        this.Numbers?.Dispose();
    }
}


// <auto-generated/>
using System;
using System.Buffers;
using System.Buffers.Binary;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Runtime.CompilerServices;
using System.Text;
using FourSer.Contracts;
using System.IO;
using FourSer.Gen.Helpers;
using SpanReader = FourSer.Gen.Helpers.RoSpanReaderHelpers;
using StreamReader = FourSer.Gen.Helpers.StreamReaderHelpers;
using SpanWriter = FourSer.Gen.Helpers.SpanWriterHelpers;
using StreamWriter = FourSer.Gen.Helpers.StreamWriterHelpers;

namespace FourSer.Tests.GeneratorTestCases.MemoryOwner;

public partial class Parent : ISerializable<Parent>, IDisposable
{
    public static int GetPacketSize(Parent obj)
    {
        if (obj is null) return 0;
        var size = 0;
        size += sizeof(int); // Count size for Data
        size += (obj.Data?.Memory.Length ?? 0) * sizeof(byte);
        size += Child.GetPacketSize(obj.DisposableProperty); // Size for nested type DisposableProperty
        return size;
    }

    private Parent(System.Buffers.IMemoryOwner<byte> data, FourSer.Tests.GeneratorTestCases.MemoryOwner.Child disposableProperty)
    {
        this.Data = data;
        this.DisposableProperty = disposableProperty;
    }

    public Parent()
    {
        this.Data = default;
        this.DisposableProperty = default;
    }

    public static Parent Deserialize(ref System.ReadOnlySpan<byte> buffer)
    {
        var dataCount = SpanReader.ReadInt32(ref buffer);
        var data = MemoryPool<byte>.Shared.Rent(dataCount).SliceToSize(dataCount);
        var dataSpan = data.Memory.Span;
        SpanReader.ReadBytes(ref buffer, dataSpan);
        var disposableProperty = Child.Deserialize(ref buffer);
        var obj = new Parent(data, disposableProperty);
        return obj;
    }

    public static Parent Deserialize(System.ReadOnlySpan<byte> buffer)
    {
        return Deserialize(ref buffer);
    }

    public static Parent Deserialize(System.IO.Stream stream)
    {
        var dataCount = StreamReader.ReadInt32(stream);
        var data = MemoryPool<byte>.Shared.Rent(dataCount).SliceToSize(dataCount);
        var dataSpan = data.Memory.Span;
        stream.ReadExactly(dataSpan);
        var disposableProperty = Child.Deserialize(stream);
        var obj = new Parent(data, disposableProperty);
        return obj;
    }

    public static void Serialize(Parent obj, ref System.Span<byte> data)
    {
        if (obj is null) return;
        if (obj.Data is null)
        {
            SpanWriter.WriteInt32(ref data, (int)(0));
        }
        else
        {
            SpanWriter.WriteInt32(ref data, (int)(obj.Data.Memory.Length));
            var dataSpan = obj.Data.Memory.Span;
            SpanWriter.WriteBytes(ref data, dataSpan);
        }
        if (obj.DisposableProperty is null)
        {
            throw new System.NullReferenceException($"Member \"obj.DisposableProperty\" cannot be null.");
        }
        FourSer.Tests.GeneratorTestCases.MemoryOwner.Child.Serialize(obj.DisposableProperty, ref data);
    }

    public static void Serialize(Parent obj, System.Span<byte> data)
    {
        Serialize(obj, ref data);
    }

    public static void Serialize(Parent obj, System.IO.Stream stream)
    {
        if (obj is null) return;
        if (obj.Data is null)
        {
            StreamWriter.WriteInt32(stream, (int)(0));
        }
        else
        {
            StreamWriter.WriteInt32(stream, (int)(obj.Data.Memory.Length));
            var dataSpan = obj.Data.Memory.Span;
            StreamWriter.WriteBytes(stream, dataSpan);
        }
        if (obj.DisposableProperty is null)
        {
            throw new System.NullReferenceException($"Member \"obj.DisposableProperty\" cannot be null.");
        }
        FourSer.Tests.GeneratorTestCases.MemoryOwner.Child.Serialize(obj.DisposableProperty, stream);
    }

    public void Dispose()
    {
        this.Data?.Dispose();
        if (this.DisposableProperty is System.IDisposable disposable_disposableProperty)
        {
            disposable_disposableProperty.Dispose();
        }
    }
}
